description:
Christmas is just around the corner. Kagura is ready and waiting for her present, only to have Gintoki dodge the subject at every corner. In order to cheer up Kagura, who laments that Santa has never once come to her, the gang decides to hold a Christmas party, except it is also an end-of-the-year pot-party with only a small cake. Kagura is having no fun at all, when two Santa Clauses appear before her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Santa Claus Red Is Blood Red!
Santa Claus no Aka wa Chi no Iro
サンタクロースの赤は血の色
